39ba3a36fb223970178dcc68c1263ff3 (12:40): Kylratix and you do this why? you know even all Micro$oft office employee pc's run as admin

148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:40): you can't be a programmer and not run admin on windows
39ba3a36fb223970178dcc68c1263ff3 (12:41): yeah i considered doing this as well but well yeah, the trade off was too much hassle, you can't runas everything
148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:41): runas and a combination of at-the-console
148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:41): i'd rather be annoyed once every 2 hours
39ba3a36fb223970178dcc68c1263ff3 (12:41): my defence against the baddies is a frequently updated image of my partition :D
39ba3a36fb223970178dcc68c1263ff3 (12:42): i guess if you have data to worry about on that pc
148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:42): a chain is only as strong as its weaksest link
148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:42): you let 1 pc in your network run unsecure
148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:43): and you're going to get caught sooner or later
39ba3a36fb223970178dcc68c1263ff3 (12:43): yeah its always a fight between usability and security in the end
39ba3a36fb223970178dcc68c1263ff3 (12:43): you have to compromise one or the other
148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:44): vista lets you get more of the former with more of the latter
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:44): And I do not run admin on Windows.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:44): Nor do I see why one should have to.
148e6ec39643fb67235c4ed7d2dc6388 (12:44): Ardonik: i am too and i agree. but i get a lot of flak from the rest
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:45): For a good site about running as non-admin, try the non-admin wiki or the non-admin blog.
8471106e57b6ecc57969d2bdf7c8ce14 (12:45): I mentioned it for others who seemed to be looking for a help site
39ba3a36fb223970178dcc68c1263ff3 (12:45): thanks Ardonik i will check it out anyway
